text: 2.25-26 Wkp 24.9, 1 Sml 21.6 Agelak, Jisas kɨlop agak, Bɨlel bɨnak Abiyatal ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl ak yolɨgup agak. Anɨb ñɨn ak, Depid ne bɨne okok ayɨp yuwan gek, God kal ak amjakɨlak agak. Amjakɨl, Depid God kal ak mɨgan amɨl bilet dɨl ñɨbɨl, bɨne okok kɨlop ñek ñɨŋɨlak agak. Bilet anɨb ak God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ak lelɨgɨpal, bɨ yokɨp ma ñɨbal, bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok nep ñɨbal agak. Depid nop yuwan gek bilet dɨl ñɨŋak kesɨm anɨb ak, buk Baybol kɨl tɨkɨlak ak, nɨb ma nepɨm agak?
